TopicTitle: Changing Tank Resources with Module Manager Configs

Articles.Content:
How can you replace a tank resource using mm configs? I tried using different methods. Can you please help me?

Thanks, Bottle Rocketeer 500

Example

To change this part from MonoPropellant to LiquidFuel: 

PART
{
	name = foo

	RESOURCE
	{
		name = MonoPropellant
		amount = 10
		maxAmount = 10
	}
}

Use this patch 

@PART[foo]
{
	@RESOURCE[MonoPropellant]
	{
		@name = LiquidFuel
	}
}

NOTE: ModuleManager is case sensitive
